title: The Importance of Being Seven
author: McCall Smith, Alexander
snippet: "Well, I know you're going to laugh at this, but I was thinking of putting his name down for Muirfield.

title: Cruciform Mark. The strange story of Richard Tregenna, etc
author: Stephens, Riccardo.
snippet: ' You remember what Muirfield said after last class exam., Green ?'This referred to Professor Muirfield's sarcasm on Green'sorthography in his class examination, and his suggestion thatneither was he, Muirfield, a spelling-master, nor was the University an infant school.
